mapper.select: select sid,sex,name,BIRTHDAY,ID_NO,origin_name,form_name,department_name,job_name,statu_name from staff,origin,FORM,department,job,statu where staff.origin_id=origin.origin_id AND staff.FORM_id=FORM.FORM_id AND staff.department_id=department.department_id AND staff.job_id=job.job_id AND staff.statu_id=statu.statu_id AND SID= #{staffId}

select sid,sex,name,BIRTHDAY,ID_NO,origin_name,form_name,department_name,job_name,statu_name from staff,origin,FORM,department,job,statu where staff.origin_id=origin.origin_id AND staff.FORM_id=FORM.FORM_id AND staff.department_id=department.department_id AND staff.job_id=job.job_id AND staff.statu_id=statu.statu_id
mapper.update: update staff a set a.sex=#{sex}, a.NAME = #{name} ,a.birthday=#{birthday},a.id_no=#{id_no},a.origin_id=#{origin_id},a.form_id=#{form_id} where a.sid=#{sid}
